author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: أَيْ رَبِّ احْفَظْ عِبادَكَ وَإِمَائَكَ عَنْ رَمْيِ الظُّنُونِ وَالأَوْهامِ ثُمَّ أَشْرِبْهُمْ سَلْسَبِيلَ عِرْفانِكَ بِأَيادِي فَضْلِكَ،
translation: Keep safe Thy servants and Thy handmaidens, O my Lord, from the darts of idle fancy and vain imaginings, and give them from the hands of Thy grace a draught of the soft-flowing waters of Thy knowledge.
